channel.title: cdnjs.com - library updates
channel.description: Track when libraries are added and updated! Managed by Ryan Kirkman and Thomas Davis. Sponsored and hosted by Cloudflare

item.title: gsap updated to version 1.9.2
item.description:
GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) is a suite of tools for scripted animation, including TweenLite, TweenMax, TimelineLite, TimelineMax, various easing equations (EasePack), plugins for things like animating along Bezier paths, tweening RaphaelJS objects, etc. and it also includes a jQuery plugin that hijacks the native jQuery.animate() method so that animations perform much better and additional properties can be tweened, like colors, transforms (2D and 3D), boxShadow, borderRadius, clip, and lots more. GSAP has no dependencies on jQuery and it can animate ANY numeric property of ANY object.

//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/gsap/1.9.2/TweenMax.min.js
item.dc:creator: cdnjs team

item.title: select2 updated to version 3.3.1
item.description:
Select2 is a jQuery based replacement for select boxes. It supports searching, remote data sets, and infinite scrolling of results. Look and feel of Select2 is based on the excellent Chosen library.

//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/select2/3.3.1/select2.min.js
item.dc:creator: cdnjs team

item.title: coffee-script updated to version 1.6.2
item.description:
CoffeeScript is a little language that compiles into JavaScript. Underneath all of those embarrassing braces and semicolons, JavaScript has always had a gorgeous object model at its heart. CoffeeScript is an attempt to expose the good parts of JavaScript in a simple way.

//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/coffee-script/1.6.2/coffee-script.min.js

item.title: backbone.js updated to version 1.0.0
item.description:
Backbone supplies structure to JavaScript-heavy applications by providing models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing application over a RESTful JSON interface.

//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/backbone.js/1.0.0/backbone-min.js

item.title: breezejs(1.2.5) was added
item.description:
BreezeJS is a JavaScript library for managing data in data rich-client HTML/JS applications. Core features include client-side querying, caching, change-tracking, validation, batch saves.

//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/breezejs/1.2.5/breeze.min.js

item.title: jquery.selectboxit updated to version 3.3.0
item.description:
A jQuery plugin that progressively enhances an HTML Select Box into a single option dropdown list. The dropdown list can be optionally styled with jQuery ThemeRoller and optionally animated with jQueryUI show/hide effects.

//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery.selectboxit/3.3.0/jquery.selectBoxIt.min.js
item.dc:creator: cdnjs team
